column5: La Casita Escondida is a peaceful and quiet guest house, centrally located in the Monte Vista Historic District. This 500 sq. ft. stand alone structure sits behind our main house which was built in 1927, with its own private entrance. We're about 2 miles north of downtown, & just minutes away from the Pearl, SA Zoo, Museum, and walking distance to popular restaurants in neighborhood. Our location also allows for quick access to all the major highways within the city...IH10, I35, and Hwy 281.
column8: La Casita Escondida (Monte Vista Historic Dist.)
